html.p: Welcome to Splunk 6, the newest release of the leading operational intelligence platform used by over 6,000 organizations worldwide. This version delivers our fastest analytical platform to date, self-service operational intelligence, more intuitive user experience to increase productivity for all users, simplified management of enterprise-scale deployments, and richer developer environment for building custom Splunk apps.
This application will guide you through the new features by providing examples, including sample reports and dashboards. More information and details are available in our documentation for Splunk 6.

td.p: All new interface that increases productivity of individual users by optimizing access to specific apps and content
Redesigned Home Page provides easy customization and access to application sub pages
Optimized access enables searching and analyzing of data from a single interface
Analytical tools that anyone can use
Make unstructured data more valuable by developing Data Models. Data models are structured data sets that drive Pivot and can be created by administrators and power users
Explore, manipulate, and visualize Machine Data without using the search language
Find patterns in data to predict system capacity and resource utilization
Build interactive dashboards and user workflows using Simple XML and the integrated development framework
Develop, integrate, and enhance apps in languages developers know and love
Use Simple XML to embed and manage native Splunk Maps to display results
New Web Framework extends Splunk dashboards with client and server-side scripting
Simplified and scalable management capabilities for enterprise Splunk deployments
Easy-to-use interface for deployment server and managing forwarders
Monitor cluster health and manage deployments through a new, centralized dashboard
